data.name: Domina
data.detailed_description:
Take charge of a gladiator school in Ancient Rome & test your strength in lightning-fast, bloody battles of pixels and raunchy insults!


Wrangle politicians and win favor from the Gods to achieve victory in the arena! Elevate your family name with success, or starve to death in obscurity and defeat.

Domina is a Pixelart Gladiator Management Simulator with Chariot Racing and Twitch Integration, vaguely based on Roman gladiator schools circa {55B.C. - 55A.D.}

data.short_description: A Spectacle of Violence and Greed - DOMINA is the Finest Gladiator Management Simulator in the World. Fortified with Chariot Racing and Twitch Integration! Do not trust the weak imposters - there is no competition - only DOMINA will make you STRONG.
